name: Snowy Evening
overview:
Snowy Evening is a bug/issue tracking application that brings users, clients, and developers together. With it’s perfectly clean and professional design it’s extremely easy for clients and users to use, without sacrificing the powerful features developers are used to.

Snowy offers traditional issue tracking features like projects, milestones, file attachments, assignees, etc, yet goes well beyond with powerful filtering and search, GitHub integration, remote error logging APIs, jsFiddle integration, and more.

Your development life is easier with Snowy. Join now for a forever-free account with one private project, unlimited public projects, or choose from our paid plans for those who need more. Enterprise-ready custom installations of Snowy are also available.
